https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Write code to get the Agent to the pressure plate, then press "Run" and use the arrow keys to move the player out of the house to collect the chest.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
The door is locked, but the Agent is here to help!

Snap a `move forward` block to the bottom of the `when run` block in the workspace to get the Agent to the pressure plate [PressurePlate_Up], then press "Run" and use the arrow keys to move out of the house to collect the **chest** [chest].

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_a: Drag one `move forward` block from the toolbox to the workspace, and snap it into place beneath the `when run` block.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_b: Don't forget to click "Run" to run the code for the Agent.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_c: Once the Agent has run all of its code, you can move the player with the arrow keys!

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Move the Agent to the pressure plate so that {currentPlayerName} can get to the map.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
{currentPlayerName} is headed on an adventure! To help, get the **map** [map_empty] behind the locked door on the right. 

Snap the code into the workspace to move the Agent to the pressure plate [PressurePlate_Up] so that {currentPlayerName} can get through.

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_a: Move the Agent forward two spaces to stand on the pressure plate.  That will open the door for your player.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_b:
Press "Run"!

You can run your code even if it's not right.  Run and reset your code over and over again until you figure out what's going wrong.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_c: Once the Agent has opened the door, use the arrow keys to move the player to the map!
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_d: Make sure the Agent is following the path outlined on the map!

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Code the Agent to open the gate.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
{currentPlayerName} continues on the adventure and needs the **compass** [compass] to prepare for the trip.  

Code the Agent to open the gate.

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_03_Cole_a: Once you get the Agent to the pressure plate, you can use your arrow keys to walk the player to the compass!
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_03_Cole_b: Does the code feel a little long?  Try using a `repeat` loop and see if you can figure out how to make it shorter!

callouts.MC_HOC_2017_03_Cole_1: This is a `repeat` loop!  Click it into the workspace and add code that you want to run over and over.

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Get the Agent to the pressure plate.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
The Agent can move across water!  

Use a `repeat` loop to solve this puzzle and help {currentPlayerName} get to the **bucket** [bucket_empty] behind the door.

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_a: The Agent needs to `move forward` 7 times.  How can you use a `repeat` loop to make that happen?
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_c:
Press "Run"!

You can run your code even if it's not right.  Run and reset your code over and over again until you figure out what's going wrong.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_b: Once the Agent gets to the pressure plate, the Agent will open the door for the player.

callouts.MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_a: The Agent can hover over water, but the player can't!

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Get the Agent to the pressure plate.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
You made it across! 

Now, get {currentPlayerName} safely through the maze to collect the **axe** [diamond_axe]

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_04POINT5_RYAN_b: Use the `turn right` block to change the agent's direction
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_04POINT5_RYAN_a: The Agent only needs to get to the first pressure plate to let Alex or Steve through to the axe.

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Get the player to the shovel.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
Oh no, the bridge is out! 

Code the Agent to rebuild the bridge using the [blockly block][0] block so that {currentPlayerName} can get to the **shovel** [diamond_shovel].

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_05_Cole_a: Did you know that you can put more than one piece of code inside of a loop?  Try moving forward **and** placing a plank inside of a `repeat` to complete this puzzle.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_05_Cole_b: Get the Agent across the river, building a bridge as you go.

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Fix this code to get the Agent to build a bridge across this river.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
Another river, but this one is much wider! 

Fix this code to help the Agent build a bridge so that {currentPlayerName} can get to the **pickaxe** [diamond_pickaxe].

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_06_Cole_a: How many times does this loop run?  How many times _should_ it run?
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_06_Cole_b: Help the Agent build a bridge all the way across the water!

callouts.MC_HOC_2017_06_Cole_1: You cannot throw these blocks away, but you can edit them!

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Use the `build bridge` function twice to make a path to the Redstone Torch.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
A **function** named `build bridge` is in your workspace.  All of the code you need to cross the river is built right in! 

Snap the small, green [blockly block][0] block into your workspace twice to fix the path and get {currentPlayerName} to the Redstone Torch [redstone_torch].

authored_hints.Function_intro_Ryan_b: If you call the functions correctly, this is the path you will travel...
authored_hints.Function_intro_Ryan_a: You can call a function many times inside of your program!  Try calling it twice to solve this puzzle.

callouts.Function_intro_Ryan_1: This little instruction tells the computer to run the BIG chunk of code with the same name in the workspace.

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Destroy the ice and get {currentPlayerName} to the Minecart.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
There's ice in the way!  

The `clear path` function can help you destroy the ice and get {currentPlayerName} to the Minecart [minecart_normal]!

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_c: All you need to have the Agent do is clear the path to the Minecart.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_a: To solve this puzzle, figure out what the `clear path` function does and call it as many times as you need using the small green `clear path` block from the toolbox.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_b: Try mixing the function blocks with other blocks from the toolbox to help you solve this puzzle.

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Use the functions to finish this minecart track.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions:
Can you spot the difference between the two functions in your workspace? 

Use these functions with other code from the toolbox to clear a path for the Minecart, then collect the **Flint and Steel** [flint_and_steel].

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_10_Cole_b: Don't know where to go?  See if you can find the dotted line!
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_10_Cole_a: Use functions to make solving this puzzle easier!

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: Use the functions to find a way across the lava.
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions: Look at the functions below.  How can you use them to avoid the Ghasts and help {currentPlayerName} make it safely to the **Enchanted Book** [book_enchanted]?

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_08_RY_a:
Press "Run"!

You can run your code even if it's not right.  Run and reset your code over and over again until you figure out what's going wrong.
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_08_RY_b: There are LOTS of ways to solve this puzzle.  Try a few!
authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_08_RY_c: Try following the dotted line for a simple path through the lava.

callouts.MC_HOC_2017_08_RY_1: The Agent can hover over lava, but Steve and Alex can't!

https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.short_instructions: **Freeplay:**  Time to explore on your own!
https://studio.code.org/s/hero/stage/1/p.long_instructions: **Freeplay:** Now it's up to you! Use the Agent's code to help you explore this world.

authored_hints.MC_HOC_2017_13_Cole_a: Try having the Agent build some minecart tracks so you can explore the world!
